segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a monk with five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātī hoti, adinnādāyī hoti, abrahmacārī hoti, musāvādī hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhāyī hoti.
segments.en: He kills living creatures, steals, has sex, lies, and uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: A monk with these five qualities is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: A monk with five qualities is raised up to heaven.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, abrahmacariyā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti.
segments.en: He doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, have sex, lie, or use alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: A monk with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
